title: Does NASA plan to threaten the superflocano geoengineer Yellowstone?
subtitle: An NASA theory paper was misunderstood in 2015 in 2018 to point to the urgent need for geological engineering to resolve Yellowstone ' s explosive potential.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Although Callostone Caldera has repeatedly claimed that it is not a great danger in our lives, NASA has admitted that the threat is real and is working to resolve it.
